part packs:

if missing parts... pm i will gladly help i have used sooo sooo many...
No just parts, from Downunder and RC... i should be attaching now
38mb too big to attach but they are all parts found on exchange

You just need to list them. You DON\'T reupload them. That\'s considered bad tact. 

So just compile a comprehensive list of the mods required and you should be good.

> ![iPr3S.png](http://i.imgur.com/iPr3S.png)

That\'s the farthest I ever got from the solar system. And yes, that is Kerbol right there.
Jatizso nice, i don\'t know if mine is farther or not. I do know that its a 2 stage rocket that is fast as lighting leaving....
